Articles.Content: I finally connected my rocket on my space station. The station has a really big tank full of fuel, how do I transfer said fuel to my spaceship?
Right click on first tank, ALT+Right Click on second tank et voilÃƒÂ , you have the transfer options!
Right click one tank, and then Alt+ Right click the other tank. Then the transfer info should come up.

You have to be docked to the space station and the connections have to support fuel transfer. Other methods for transferring fuel are the Quantum Fuel Transfer system (which is great for ships landed near to each other) and you have to get a a Kerbal to walk up to one node (that you placed on the ship), right click on it and then walk over to the second ship's Quantum Fuel Node and right click on that and there is a virtual pipe connecting the two ships.

Going back to the first method (docking, right clicking and then alt-right clicking) you can transfer pretty much any resource, including electrical charge. Great for rescuing dead probes that ran out of electricity heh. Of course you have to catch them first.

Is the quantum transfer a mod or something?

Is the quantum transfer a mod or something?

yes, it allow you to transfer fuel without docking
Quantum Fuel Transfer is a mod.
